meanings.definition: A person who is being examined.
meanings.sent1: The examinees sat quietly in the classroom, waiting for the test to begin.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out the exam papers to the examinees.
meanings.sent3: The examinees tried to sneak a peek at each other's answers, but the teacher caught them.
meanings.sent4: The examinees were like detectives, searching for clues in the questions.
meanings.sent5: The nervous examinees fidgeted in their seats, hoping they studied enough.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals taking an examination.
meanings.sent1: All the examinees gathered in the gymnasium before the big test.
meanings.sent2: The examinees were relieved when the exam was finally over.
meanings.sent3: The examinees formed study groups to prepare for the upcoming test.
meanings.sent4: The examinees moved quickly through the questions, determined to finish on time.
meanings.sent5: The group of examinees cheered together after completing the challenging exam.
